title: Edinburgh/New Town
name: The Georgian House
hours: daily, Mar 1-27:11AM-4PM, Mar 28-Jun 30 and Sep-Oct: 10AM-5PM, Jul-Aug: 10AM-6, Nov: 11AM-3PM
price: Â£6, free to National Trust Members
content: The house was designed by Robert Adam and is furnished as it would have been around 1796. See how life was in the New Town in the 18th century, from the dining rooms to kitchen in the basement.
